paper.title: Files with semantics

author.org: Rutgers University, Hill Center, Busch Campus, New Brunswick, New Jersey

paper.venue: International Conference on Management of Data
paper.abstract: The conventional concept of file is reexamined, and found to be unsatisfactory, both as a linguistic concept in a programming language and as a tool for data processing. A new file concept is proposed which unlike the conventional file attempts to simulate an intelligent archivist rather than a filing cabinet.
